title: Were there any stories of soldiers who served in both World Wars? - Quora

response.answer_text: There were many. Almost all generals in WWII we're junior officers in WWI. The one I remember fondly is a US Army private in WWI who ends up leading a platoon in WWII in North Africa, Italy and finally France. Somewhere along the way he got promoted to major and took these 12 convicts on a suicide mission behind enemy lines…twice! I can't recall his name, but here's a picture of him.  *Yes, I know that's Lee Marvin.
Well, just considering US soldiers who served in both World Wars, perhaps you have heard stories about Gen. Marshal, George Patton, and Dwight Eisenhower. There are more.
